segments.text: Too ... your face is really oily ... perfect !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? Are you planning to stir-fry my face ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nope . I'm going to tell your fortune . So ... the oilier , the better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's facial paper , and it fits into the rings of my binder ! It's magical .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Let's see . Give me a sheet .
segments.speaker: S2
